Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no decision to waive off the withdrawal fee for the Common ATM switch facility in Sri Lanka.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official announcement to support the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the withdrawal fee for the Common ATM switch facility has been waived off without providing any evidence or confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the spokesperson for LankaClear, stating that no decision has been made to revise or waive off the withdrawal fee for CAS.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the information by stating that the withdrawal fee has been completely waived off, while there is no evidence to support this.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it contradicts the information provided by private banks and the national payment infrastructure organization.
